regressionCases.title: API failure regression: GET http://localhost:3001/api/claims?limit=50&page=1
regressionCases.testIdea: Replay GET http://localhost:3001/api/claims?limit=50&page=1 in API smoke and assert status < 400.
regressionCases.expected: API endpoint should return success class status.
